description:
Sailor V is a preliminary form, under which http://anidb.net/ch7344 [Minako] fought alone before the other Sailor Senshi were awakened. The V is short for Venus. She wore a different uniform under this name, most notably a red mask, and her appearance and powers incorporated the use of a crescent motif.
In the early storyline of Sailor Moon, she is something of a celebrity figure, of whom Usagi is a great fan.
Sailor V was first introduced as the protagonist of Takeuchi Naoko`s much-shorter manga series, Codename: Sailor V, of which Sailor Moon is a sequel.
Source: wiki
name: Sailor V
